explains: n. 取消，撤销；作废，废除
wordGroup: cancellation of registration 取消登记

sentences.en: We need at least 24 hours' notice of cancellation.
sentences.cn: 如欲取消，请至少提前24小时告知。

sentences.en: Heavy seas can cause cancellation of ferry services.
sentences.cn: 海上起风浪会导致渡轮航班取消。

sentences.en: The insured must be given at least 10 days' notice of cancellation.
sentences.cn: 取消保险必须给被保险人至少十天的事先通知。
